Package it.polimi.ingsw.client.gui.controllers

Class LoaderController

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.client.gui.controllers.LoaderController
All Implemented Interfaces:
GUIController
public class LoaderController
extends java.lang.Object
implements GUIController
LoaderController class is the loading screen controller which covers the color, challenger and worker placement phases. By using several calls to main GUI class, it has a 360-degree view on the GUI package and can make modifications based on the actual server request.
See Also:
GUIController

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void challengerPhase​(ChallengerMessages req)
    Method ChallengerPhase receives a ChallengerMessage request from the server and calls one of the methods above, relying on his type and fields.
    protected void displayGodList​(ChallengerMessages req)
    Method displayGodList displays the game's gods list received from the server and lets the challenger choose the god powers to put in game deck.
    boolean godTile​(Card god, boolean isChoosing)
    Method goTile opens a new god tile which displays information about the name, thumbnail and description of a single god.
    void requestColor​(java.util.List<PlayerColors> colors)
    Method requestColor lets each user choose his workers' color, however, in a match of 3 players the last one receives the remaining color.
    void requestPlayerNumber​(java.lang.String message)
    Method requestPlayerNumber lets the first user, who connect to the server, choose the nax umber of player of the lobby (2 o 3); the capacity is then set based on his choice.
    void setFontSize​(int size)
    Method setFontSize resizes the status label of the loader screen.
    void setGui​(GUI gui)
    Method setGui sets the GUI reference to the local controller.
    void setText​(java.lang.String text)
    Method setText sets the text of this LoaderController object.
    protected void startingPlayer​(ChallengerMessages req)
    Method startingPlayer lets the challenger choose the starting player by simply clicking on his nickname.

  • Method Details

    • setText

      public void setText​(java.lang.String text)
      Method setText sets the text of this LoaderController object.
      Parameters:
      text - the text of this LoaderController object.

    • godTile

      public boolean godTile​(Card god, boolean isChoosing)
      Method goTile opens a new god tile which displays information about the name, thumbnail and description of a single god. It's used during the challenger selection phase and during the single user selection phase.
      Parameters:
      god - of type Card - the god tile to be opened.
      isChoosing - of type boolean - the value that states if the phase is the challenger or the choosing one.
      Returns:
      boolean true if the god is chosen / selected, false otherwise.

    • startingPlayer

      protected void startingPlayer​(ChallengerMessages req)
      Method startingPlayer lets the challenger choose the starting player by simply clicking on his nickname.
      Parameters:
      req - of type ChallengerMessage - the first player request sent from the server.

    • displayGodList

      protected void displayGodList​(ChallengerMessages req)
      Method displayGodList displays the game's gods list received from the server and lets the challenger choose the god powers to put in game deck.
      Parameters:
      req - of type ChallengerMessage - the list received from the server

    • challengerPhase

      public void challengerPhase​(ChallengerMessages req)
      Method ChallengerPhase receives a ChallengerMessage request from the server and calls one of the methods above, relying on his type and fields.
      Parameters:
      req - of type ChallengerMessages - the ChallengerMessage received from the server.

    • requestPlayerNumber

      public void requestPlayerNumber​(java.lang.String message)
      Method requestPlayerNumber lets the first user, who connect to the server, choose the nax umber of player of the lobby (2 o 3); the capacity is then set based on his choice.
      Parameters:
      message - of type String - the request of players' number.

    • requestColor

      public void requestColor​(java.util.List<PlayerColors> colors)
      Method requestColor lets each user choose his workers' color, however, in a match of 3 players the last one receives the remaining color.
      Parameters:
      colors - of type List<PlayerColors> - the available colors.

    • setFontSize

      public void setFontSize​(int size)
      Method setFontSize resizes the status label of the loader screen.
      Parameters:
      size - of type int - the font size to be set.

    • setGui

      public void setGui​(GUI gui)
      Description copied from interface: GUIController
      Method setGui sets the GUI reference to the local controller.
      Specified by:
      setGui in interface GUIController
      Parameters:
      gui - of type GUI - the main GUI class.
